body_html: closing this, as Alban pointed out this is user error (even the error message is triggered correctly). You'll have to fix your code bugs. I think it working on mac but not linux probably is around the dataset you are using on either machines is maybe different (maybe linux only has partial dataset by mistake or is loading only partial dataset)
